summary: Complete E2E testing of ScrollSyncHero, landing page sections, auth pages CSS consistency, and auth flow. All tests PASSED.

minor.issue: Intermittent 520 errors during dashboard data fetch (appears to be transient/network issue)

issues: Pre-existing: Recharts console warnings about chart width/height -1 during initial render - cosmetic only, does not affect functionality

critical_code_review_comments: ScrollSyncHero component working correctly - auto-cycling images every 4 seconds with crossfade animation
5 export/logistics images displaying: container terminal, cargo ship, shipping containers, finance dashboard, cargo plane
Progress dots on right side allow manual image selection
Image captions display correctly: 'Global Logistics Network', 'Seamless International Trade', 'Port Operations Excellence', 'Smart Financial Analytics', 'Air Freight Solutions'
NO blank sections on landing page when scrolling
All landing page sections render properly: Hero, Problem (3 cards), How It Works, Features (3 cards), Trust (5 badges), Dashboard Preview, Pricing (3 cards), About, Contact, Footer
Login and Register pages have consistent dark theme with violet accents
Auth flow works correctly - registration creates user, login authenticates, logout redirects to landing
seed_data_creation: Created new test user during registration flow testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features working correctly. ScrollSyncHero auto-cycles through 5 logistics/export images every 4s. Landing page has all sections visible with no blank areas. Auth pages (Login/Register) have consistent dark theme with violet accents. Dashboard loads correctly after login with sidebar navigation, stat cards, charts, quick actions, and risk alerts. New users see 'Welcome to ExportFlow!' empty state.

tests: Playwright UI test - verified 5 image indicator dots, auto-cycling, manual selection
ScrollSyncHero_Image_Cycling.details: 5 images auto-cycle every 4 seconds with crossfade animation. Progress dots allow manual selection. Captions display correctly.

Hero_Content_Visible_On_Load.details: Badge 'Built for Indian Exporters', headline 'Stop losing 3-5%...', CTA 'Start Recovering Capital', scroll indicator all visible

tests: Playwright scroll test - verified all 8 sections
Landing_Page_No_Blank_Sections.details: All sections visible when scrolling: Problem, How It Works, Features, Trust, Dashboard Preview, Pricing, About, Contact

Pricing_Cards.details: 3 pricing cards visible: Starter (Free), Professional (â‚¹2,999/month with 'Most Popular' badge), Enterprise (Custom)

Login_Page_CSS.details: Dark theme (bg: #09090B), violet accents, 'Back to Home' link, ExportFlow logo clickable, form inputs with data-testid, 4 feature cards on left panel, trust indicators

Register_Page_CSS.details: Dark theme, 'Get Started Free' badge, 'Back to Home' link, ExportFlow logo clickable, password strength indicator, 4 features list, gradient orbs background

tests: Playwright E2E test + backend API test
Auth_Flow_Registration.details: New user registration works - creates user, shows success toast 'Account created successfully!', redirects to dashboard with 'Welcome to ExportFlow!' empty state

tests: Playwright E2E test + backend API test
Auth_Flow_Login.details: Login with test@moradabad.com works - shows 'Welcome back!' toast, redirects to dashboard

Dashboard_After_Login.details: Dashboard loads with sidebar navigation (Dashboard, Shipments, Documents, Payments, Forex, GST & Compliance, Incentives, AI Assistant, Credit, Connectors, Security & Audit, Notifications, Settings, Logout), header with user info, stat cards, quick actions

Logout_Flow.details: Clicking Logout button redirects to landing page and clears auth state

api_endpoints_tested: POST /api/auth/login - Returns access_token (900s TTL), refresh_token (7 days), user object
POST /api/auth/register - Creates new user, returns tokens
